title: Jonathan Kodjia - Wikipedia
snippet: Jonathan Adjo Kodjia (born 22 October ... the Ivory Coast national team. Kodjia started his career at Reims and gained experience in the Championnat National (French third division) and Ligue 2 with Cherbourg, Caen and Amiens....

title: Jonathan Kodjia
snippet: Jonathan Kodjia signed his first professional contract with Stade de Reims in 2008, marking the beginning of his senior career with the club.[13] Initially, he featured for the club's reserve team in the Championnat de France Amateur 2 (CFA 2), the fifth tier of French football, where he contributed goals while developing his skills.[2] This period allowed Kodjia to gain competitive experience in lower divisions before transitioning to the first team.
